name: A Part of Me (Tezza48, Stuck in a Lift Studios)
name_original: A Part of Me (Tezza48, Stuck in a Lift Studios)
description:
Geraldine can use Legs to run faster, Arms to Climb walls and a Jump pack to jump higher but she only has enough power to use 2 of these parts at once.

Explore the factory and chose which parts you will use to progress.
